revised_title: Changes Undergone by Chlorophyll in Animals
tldr: The author investigates the changes that chlorophyll undergoes in the animal body after consuming food containing chlorophyll. They found that chlorophyll does not remain unchanged in the excrements of herbivores, debunking a common statement in physiological chemistry. This study provides insights into the digestion and metabolism of chlorophyll in animals.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Animal Physiology
